item.description:
Social Networking Event!

CLICK HERE to RSVP!  Mention coupon code "soxnatives" to save $2!

Just think of it as your own social network!  BeantownSocial.com is hosting this event at The Back Bay Social Club, in Back Bay.  This social networking event brings together people involved in social media and interested in semi-professional networking, making new friends and getting the heck out from behind your computer for a change.  Do you have problems getting out there and "Professionally Networking" because it intimidates you?  This opportunity gives you the chance to meet people who could possibly be your new BFF's or business partners.

Here's what to expect from one of our events:

  • an appetizer table including some yummy picky foods by Back Bay Social Club
  • a large nook in their bar for us to drink and mingle
  • a casual meeting place where people are interested in connecting with new people for both business and social networking
  • a diverse group of people from different backgrounds and industries
  • people involved in and wanting to know about social media and creative marketing in general
  • corporate executives, start ups, entrepreneurs..
  • opportunity to be featured as a company that is hiring (email us)

Please email us if you would like to sponsor this event.  We're looking for bar tab sponsors, door prize sponsors--and always looking for creativity when it comes down to giveaways at our events!

Please sign up for updates from Beantown Social in our Facebook Group!  Also, follow us on Twitter: @BeantownSocial

See you @ Back Bay Social Club on the 16th!

This is a 21+ event.

You can find our group downstairs, in their networking nook :)
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the large nook on the left side of the restaurant when you walk in
item.name: Beantown Social @ Back Bay Social Club
